trans-unit.source: Converts the specified HTTP request data into a standard form appropriate for signing.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP request that needs to be signed.

trans-unit.source: The name of the storage account that the HTTP request will access.

trans-unit.source: The canonicalized string containing the HTTP request data in a standard form appropriate for signing.
